Wondering if anyone here has had personal experience with Dr Rorke and his =
investigations into EVP-ITC.=A0 I found his "slams" well=A0deserved in=A0si=
tuations=A0that he investigated.=A0 In fact, I was rather stunned by his cl=
aims of=A0about an ex CIA guy named Puharich being involved in mind control=
 experiments and EVPers and mediums.=A0 I checked out his web site and foun=
d a lot to digest...I have yet to finish.=A0 Check it out if you wish at ww=
w.spiricomstudy.com
=A0
I would be very interested in learning more about D=
r Rorke and his findings.=A0 Yea, Chris Moon got slammed pretty good...or b=
ad...depending on your pov=A0=A0 ron l=A0

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Wondering if anyone here has had personal experience with Dr Rorke and his investigations into EVP-ITC.  I found his "slams" well deserved in situations that he investigated.  In fact, I was rather stunned by his claims of about an ex CIA guy named Puharich being involved in mind control experiments and EVPers and mediums.  I checked out his web site and found a lot to digest...I have yet to finish.  Check it out if you wish at <A href="http://www.spiricomstudy.com">www.spiricomstudy.com</A></DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I would be very interested in learning more about Dr Rorke and his findings.  Yea, Chris Moon got slammed pretty good...or bad...depending on your pov   ron l <BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 11/7/08, don powell <I><dpowell7299@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>

<TD vAlign=top><BR>You know, it sounded to me like that guy was slamming all of it.  Even EVPs.  Although I'm fine with Chris Moon bashing :)  It just sounded like he was saying all of it was useless.<BR><BR>Don<BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 11/7/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <I><michaelcoletta@ yahoo.com></I></B> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@ yahoo.com><BR>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Chris Moon and his use of Franks Box gets slammed<BR>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com<BR>Date: Friday, November 7, 2008, 9:42 AM<BR><BR>

<DIV>Chris Moon and his use of Franks Box gets slammed</DIV>
<DIV>Last night on Coast to Coast AM George Noory had Dr. Stephen Rorke on-air.  He discussed the field of instrumental transcommunication (ITC), his study of the Spiricom case, Frank's Box, and EVP capture.<BR>It was during his discussion of Frank's Box where he brought up the name Chris Moon.  He also brought up exactly what he thought of Chris Moon's use of the Franks Box he calls his telephone to the dead.<BR>Better than writng about it, I've placed a link to the audio from last night, at my post below.</DIV>
<DIV><A href="http://ufomagazine.blogspot.com/2008/11/chris-moon-and-his-use-of-franks-box.html" target=_blank rel=nofollow>http://ufomagazine. blogspot. com/2008/ 11/chris- moon-and- his-use-of- franks-box. html</A></DIV>
<DIV>- Mike (UFO Geek)</DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
